title: Pixel Waiting List
content:
I have joined the waiting list for the Pixel 4a 5g 
How will I be informed when the phone is available 

Will this be via email ?
Will the mail come from Google i.e. ?????@google.com ? 

OR

Do I need to keep going back to the Google Store web page

If I knew I was to expect an email and from whoever - that would be easier to monitor as I currently don't know where to check !!
